actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 in order to require the screening by weapons-detecting devices of all passengers in regularly scheduled air transportation.

summary.text: Provides that regulations shall be prescribed, under the Federal Aviation Act, requiring that all passengers and carry-on baggage in regularly scheduled air transportation be screened by weapons-detecting devices. Authorizes appropritations for such purpose. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1348)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 in order to require the screening by weapons-detecting devices of all passengers in regularly scheduled air transportation.
